channel.title: Posts on ryanl.ee
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on ryanl.ee

item.title: Post Animal - Perform the Most Curious Water Activities
item.author: ryan@ryanl.ee (Ryan Lee)
item.description: Now I've got my goggles on Let's see what I can see… Yeah, this is that guy from Stranger Things’ band. Favorite Tracks: Goggles, Alabaster, Eel

item.title: Say Anything - Is a Real Boy
item.author: ryan@ryanl.ee (Ryan Lee)
item.description: I can't get laid in this town without these pointy fuckin’ shoes Oh he sure do have woe. Favorite Tracks: Woe, Alive With the Glory of Love, The Futile, Every Man Has a Molly, I Want to Know Your Plans, Admit It!!!, Wow I Can Get Sexual Too, Total Revenge

item.title: Weyes Blood - Titanic Rising
item.author: ryan@ryanl.ee (Ryan Lee)
item.description: A lot's gonna change A lot's gonna change. Favorite Tracks: A Lot's Gonna Change, Something to Believe

item.title: Kim Petras - TURN OFF THE LIGHT
item.author: ryan@ryanl.ee (Ryan Lee)
item.description: Ich bin das Ende deiner Tage Ich bin die Krankheit, ich bin die Plage You're gonna die. Favorite Tracks: There Will Be Blood, Bloody Valentine, «demons», TRANSylvania

item.title: Parquet Courts - Wide Awake!
item.author: ryan@ryanl.ee (Ryan Lee)
item.description: Travel where you are Tourism is sin One more. Favorite Tracks: Mardi Gras Beads, Freebird II, Tenderness

item.title: Jeff Rosenstock - WORRY.
item.author: ryan@ryanl.ee (Ryan Lee)
item.description: WE DON'T WANT TO LIVE INSIDE A HELLHOOOOOOLE Let's just continue the “albums with punctuation” trend. Favorite Tracks: We Begged To Explode, Festival Song, [the entire second half of the album]

item.title: Lana Del Rey - Norman Fucking Rockwell!
item.author: ryan@ryanl.ee (Ryan Lee)
item.description: You're scared to win, scared to lose I've heard the war was over if you really choose The one in and around you Sometimes I miss California. Sometimes. Favorite Tracks: Mariners Apartment Complex, Cinnamon Girl, California, The greatest

item.title: King Gizzard & Lizard Wizard - Infest the Rats' Nest
item.author: ryan@ryanl.ee (Ryan Lee)
item.description: Venusian sickness dire I want to be set on fire Bring back 80s speed metal. Favorite tracks: Perihelion, Venusian 2, Self-Immolate, Hell

item.title: My Chemical Romance - Three Cheers for Sweet Revenge
item.author: ryan@ryanl.ee (Ryan Lee)
item.description: You like D&D, Audrey Hepburn, Fangoria, Harry Houdini, and croquet. You can't swim, you can't dance, and you don't know karate. Face it, you're never gonna make it. It's a damn fun album. You people remember fun, right? Favorite tracks: Helena, To the End, I'm Not Okay (I Promise), Thank You for the Venom
